climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: Our Seventh Generation EasyDose Auto-Dosing Technology measures the right detergent amount—every time. Just flip the bottle, give a firm squeeze, and you’re done. One squeeze is all you need
Ultra-concentrated, ultra-convenient liquid laundry detergent : 66 loads in a compact 23oz bottle that’s easy to store, and easy to feel good about
Small dose, big clean: 60% less plastic, 50% less water, and 75% lighter than our laundry detergent liquid 100 fl oz bottle
Our liquid laundry detergent advanced-enzyme formula fights even the most stubborn stains
Concentrated laundry detergent made with 0% dyes, synthetic fragrances, or artificial brighteners
Refreshing lavender scent made from real ingredients: 100% essential oils & botanical ingredients in our washing detergent
body.description: Life is complicated. Laundry shouldn’t be. With Seventh Generation’s new EasyDose Ultra Concentrated Liquid Laundry Detergent you get the right amount of liquid—every time. Just flip the bottle, give a firm squeeze, and you’re done. One squeeze is all you need! Our compact 23oz bottle gives you the same 66-load convenience you expect, but uses 60% less plastic, 50% less water, and is 75% lighter than our 100oz bottle. With a refreshing lavender scent made with 100% essential oils and botanical ingredients, and an advanced-enzyme formula that fights tough stains, it’s a great choice for your busy family. Easy to use, easy to store, and easy to love—our Ultra Concentrated Laundry Detergent is about to change the way you think about clean. Try with our Seventh Generation Dryer Sheets or our Liquid Fabric Softener - both available in Fresh Lavender scent! At Seventh Generation, we do business differently. We believe our products are healthy solutions for use within your home–and for the community and environment outside it. We are always evaluating how to reduce their environmental impact, increase performance and safety, and create a more sustainable supply chain. It is our responsibility to set a course for a more mindful way of doing business, where companies act as partners with other stakeholders to create a brighter future for the whole planet. Seventh Generation is proud to be a Certified B Corporation. B Corps are certified to be better for workers, better for communities, and better for the environment. By choosing Seventh Generation laundry soap washing detergent and both liquid and fabric softener sheets products, you’re joining us in nurturing the health of the next seven generations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite laundry detergent. It’s a nice light smell and less packaging. The easy dose is the best, I don’t have to measure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for coochie sensitivity
reviews.reviewText: My nether regions have thanked me for using this detergent for the past 2 years. I use to get a really bad rash-y burns from other detergents, but this is my Holy Grail detergent. Bonus points for keeping me from wasting a lot of product. Laundry is simplified!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells so good
reviews.reviewText: I really like this product, I filled up my machine and it smart dispenses each load. Do you only use what you need and it last forever. My clothes are so clean and smell so pretty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars EasyDose is a great feature
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought this because I have super sensitive skin, but my favorite thing about this detergent is the "EasyDose" function. It makes measuring the right amount of detergent super easy since I'm always afraid of adding too much. The scent is ok. Wet laundry smells vaguely of lavender, but the scent doesn't last through the dryer. I wish the scent was stronger, but I'd rather not have to worry about having an allergic reaction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been buying this laundry detergent for over a year and it doesn’t disappoint. I love how tiny the bottles are and how much use I get out of it. 2 bottles last my family of 4 2-3 months.I do wish the smell was stronger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't looking forward to trying this detergent. I have been using Sun & Earth for YEARS ... more than a decade at least. They must be going out of business because I can't find it anymore. So I had to find something else.Prior to using S&E, I had tried everything under the sun and I was allergic to ALL of it. I don't care whether it talked about being hypoallergenic or not - I had a reaction. Even baby detergents!I'm the kind of person who can't switch anything - not soaps, shampoos, detergents ... nothing. So I was apprehensive in trying this. I bought a bottle at the grocery store before coming online to buy these dispenser bottles. I have to say, I'm in love. I like the lavender scent. It's weird for me to smell a scent on my clothes, towels, etc., so it's taken me a bit to get used to it. But I like it. It's not strong at all (sometimes it is because it catches me off guard, but in reality, it's not strong at all).I haven't had an allergic reaction at all. That's key for me.I love the dispensing bottles. No measuring. Just squeeze. Every time I do the laundry I'm tempted to add an extra squeeze, but I don't. And no one in my family has complained that things aren't "clean." My son is 26 and does his own laundry, but the thing I'm noticing is his clothes don't come out of the washer quite as stinky as they usually do (you know that boy/man smell .... ICK).This is the only detergent I'll be buying from now on ... until 7th Gen goes out of business that is!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Add to your essentials
reviews.reviewText: Love the size of these bottles, easy to use, and you won’t make a mess doing laundry. Smells great, and I get a great wash from this detergent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the excessive soaper
reviews.reviewText: I always use more laundry detergent than needed. The easy dose helps me from wasting. Bonus: My husband complains about most scented laundry detergent irritating his skin, but not this one.
especially with the one squeeze and cleans well

Really helps keep costs down, especially with a husband that can't get it through his skull (lol) that he doesn't need to use much so I was going through this stuff like crazy until I found it in this bottle! I'll keep buying this one.

The smell is wonderful, very subtle, and my clothes are nice and clean without harsh chemicals. The special nozzle makes dosing a breeze and no more lugging huge detergent bottles for pouring. I will always use this brand.

Nice to have a small bottle not using as much plastic but there is no way one shot would clean my clothes still have to put at least three, smell is super mild, cleans fine but it is fading certain clothing so probably won’t buy again.
